participant_1.name: Emily Parker
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Emily enjoys participating in school events and is very focused on her future career.
participant_1.background: i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and supportive, Michael is dedicated to his family and enjoys coaching kids in sports.
participant_2.background: i coach little league baseball. i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

content.text: Hi! It is nice to see you! How is your day going? I like to make money and make money.
